content.description: <math alttext="K sub w, equals the molar concentration of H 3 O with a positive 1 charge, times the molar concentration of O H with a negative 1 charge, which equals 1.0 times 10 to the negative 14 power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>w</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>OH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>1.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> at <math alttext="25 degrees Celsius" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mi>°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: Based on the information above, which of the following is true for a sample of pure water at <math alttext="25 degrees Celsius" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mi>°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the molar concentration of H 3 O with a positive 1 charge equals 7.0 molar" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>7.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="The molar concentration of O H with a negative 1 charge equals 1.0 times 10 to the negative 14 power molar" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>OH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>1.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p H equals 10 to the negative 7 power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
